div.p: Leslie Public Schools will be providing meals to anyone age 18 and under. Please see the attached flyer for info on times, dates, and locations where meals can be picked up.
Please take a moment to read this letter from the Superintendent

a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

div.p: If your income has changed recently, you can apply for school meal assistance now even though school is closed for regular meals. The benefit status of a meal application completed and approved during the 2019-20 school year will carry over for the first 30 days of school in the fall. When we return in the fall, a new application will need to be completed for the 2020-21 school year within 30 days.

div.div: Do You Qualify for Free Breakfast and Lunch Assistance?

div.p: Do you live in your own home or apartment? If not, are you a family in transition or do you have Foster children? If so, you may be able to qualify for assistance with FREE breakfast and lunch

a.aria-label: Do You Qualify for Free Breakfast and Lunch Assistance?

div.p: To enroll for Preschool at Leslie Public Schools, please follow the link below. Don't forget to check Leslie Public Schools as your first preference.

Please view the attached file to view the calendar for the 2019-20 school year.
The first day of school will be Monday August 26, 2019.
We have launched a new way for you to sign up to work sporting events online and receive your free family pass.

div.span: Competitive wages starting at $15.75 hr. with a $750 signing bonus paid over the course of a year of driving.
Letter from Ingham County Prosecuting Attorney
If you see or hear something that doesn't seem right, you can submit a confidential tip to OK2SAY.

The mission of the LPSF is to acquire, distribute and direct resources for programs and projects aimed at enhancing, or supplementing learning opportunities for students, staff and community of LPS. For more information please click here.
